content: Yes, both the Civil War and Great Depression eras could provide interesting settings for alternative history stories set in Illinois. The state played a significant role in the Civil War, with both Union and Confederate forces operating within its borders. The city of Chicago was also a major hub of industry during the Great Depression, and there were many social and economic challenges faced by Illinoisans during that time. Additionally, Illinois has a rich history of organized crime, which could be incorporated into an alternative history story set in the 20th century.
